video_tuto3_label: Press the square button to stop recording

alhacerclickfirmas_label: Clicking 'I accept' will send the document's signatures
razonesnofirmar_label: the reasons why you won't sign this document:

unavezconfirmado_cedula_label: Once we confirm the number, you will be able to view the document.

esperandopormi_label: Signature requests waiting for my signature
nofirmoeldoc_ph: I won't sign the document because...
origenfirma_body_modal: Do you want the signatures of this contract to be placed automatically on the last page certified by Validocus?
enviardocumento_desc: Drag the document you want to send for signing. The title will be loaded automatically, and you must provide a description to help signers identify the document.
descdocumento_desc: Write a description; once finished, smart tags will appear in the tags area.
acceso_desc: *Define how the contact will access the document
agregarfirmantes_desc: Add the people who will sign the document. Enter their identification and contact information to correctly identify them before signing.
agregarvistobueno_desc: If the document requires prior approval for signing, add the approvers by entering their identification and contact details.
palabrasecreta_desc: This secret word is known only to you and the document administrator. Request it from the sender if needed.
quedarafirmado_desc: The document will be signed once the sender verifies the attachments and signatures.
unavezaceptada_desc: Once accepted, you will receive a signed copy with instructions for verification.
gracias_desc: We will inform the sender about the reasons for declining the signature request.
video_firma_desc: Video signature is a validation where signers must read a message or say a phrase. Edit the message to fit within 10 seconds.
pendienteenviar_desc:
Pending to Send

The request was sent in order or requires approval to reach this contact. Initial status of all invitations.
esperafirma_desc:
Waiting for Signature

The invitation has been sent to the contact!
esperaaprobacion_desc:
Waiting for Approval

The signer has uploaded the required signatures. You can:

  • Approve/Reject Attachments
  • Approve/Reject Signatures
firmasaprobadas_desc:
Signatures Approved

The signatures have been approved for the corresponding request.
nofirmado_desc:
Document Not Signed

The contact decided not to sign the document.
solicitudproceso_desc:
Request in Process

The request was sent to the parties, but the process is incomplete. Check the status of each contact for progress.
solicitudcerrada_desc:
Request Closed

It's time to download the signed document. Once completed, a copy will be sent to all parties with instructions for verification. Press this icon to download your signed document.

correovb_error: This email is already in the approvers list

telefonovb_error: This phone number is already in the approvers list
agregarcontactos_label: Add some contacts to the list!
nopdf_error: Error: The file does not meet the requirements
emailincorrecto_error: The email is incorrect. It must contain @ and .
mensajedefirma_desc:
Draw your signature in the white box.
If you are not satisfied, press the 'Erase' button.
Once satisfied, press the 'Save' button.
aseguradoblockchain_desc:
The signature request process is secured on the ETHEREUM network.
You can verify the information using the Transaction Hash and consult it in XML format.
anexardocs_desc: The sender of the signature request requires these documents to be uploaded before signing. Ensure the files meet the specifications for approval, as they are essential for the sender.
vistobuenorechazado_label: The document was not approved and is unavailable
videofirmarechazadairafirmar_label: Video signature rejected. Proceed to sign
firmarechazadairafirmar_label: Electronic signature rejected. Proceed to sign
documentonoaprobado_label: The document was not approved and is unavailable
procesoincompleto_label: The signing process is incomplete. You have uploaded the required documents.
lafirmadebeserenviadacondocumentos_label: The signature must be sent with the requested additional documents!
decididoaprobarsincomentarios_desc: You have decided to APPROVE the document without comments. Do you want to proceed?
decididoaprobarconcomentarios_desc:
Clicking 'Send' will send your comments to the sender.

Verify that your comments are clearly expressed.
decididonoaprobar_title: You have decided NOT TO APPROVE!
decididonoaprobar_desc:
Clicking 'Send' will notify the sender of your decision.

Ensure your comments are clearly expressed.

nohacreadosolicitudes_label: No signed documents yet. Invitations will appear here.
